content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>NERC Catalogue</ShortName>   <LongName>Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) Data Discovery Service Search</LongName>   <Description>Search the NERC metadata catalogue using the full interface</Description>   <Tags>nerc portal metadata environment</Tags>   <Contact>enquiries@bodc.ac.uk</Contact>   <Url type="application/atom+xml"        template="http://data-search.nerc.ac.uk/search/full/catalogue.atom?q={searchTerms}&c={count}&i={startIndex}"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml"        template="http://data-search.nerc.ac.uk/search/full/catalogue.rss?q={searchTerms}&c={count}&i={startIndex}"/>   <Url type="text/html"         template="http://data-search.nerc.ac.uk/search/full/catalogue?q={searchTerms}&c={count}&i={startIndex}"/>   <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/png">http://data-search.nerc.ac.uk/images_new/nerc-logo-print.png</Image>   <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">http://data-search.nerc.ac.uk/favicon.ico</Image>   <Query role="example" searchTerms="cat" />   <Developer>NERC</Developer>   <Attribution>     Search data Copyright 2010, NERC, All Rights Reserved   </Attribution>   <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>   <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>   <Language>en-gb</Language>   <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
